title: Chinese Pasta
description: Chinese Pasta is where tradition meets innovation — blending the comforting texture of noodles with rich Chinese flavors. Unlike traditional Italian pasta, Chinese pasta is often hand-pulled, knife-cut, or rolled from wheat flour, delivering a chewy, satisfying bite. Tossed in savory sauces like soy-garlic, sesame-chili, or oyster-hoisin blends, each dish brings a bold and umami-rich experience.

title: Chicken Shawarma
description: Juicy, marinated slices of chicken, slow-roasted on a vertical spit and thinly shaved to order — that's the magic of authentic Chicken Shawarma. Bursting with warm spices like cumin, paprika, garlic, and a hint of cinnamon, every bite is rich, aromatic, and satisfying.Perfect for lunch, dinner, or a quick grab-and-go bite, Chicken Shawarma brings you the taste of the streets of Istanbul — no passport needed.

title: Combo Pack
description: Contents: 1 Classic Zinger Burger, 2 Hot Wings, 1 Veg Patty, and a chilled Pepsi PET. Treat yourself to the ultimate indulgence with our Combo Delight Meal, crafted for both flavor lovers and snack seekers. This satisfying combo includes a little bit of everything — spicy, crispy, hearty, and refreshing!

title: Orange Mojito
description: Give your taste buds a tropical twist with our Orange Mojito — a vibrant fusion of sweet citrus and cooling mint, served over ice for the ultimate refreshment. It’s a sunny spin on the classic mojito, perfect for beating the heat or brightening your day.

title: Fried Chicken Burger
description: A juicy, crispy fried chicken patty, topped with crisp lettuce, jalapeno, and a tangy sauce on a toasted bun.Sink into the savory satisfaction of our Classic Burger — simple, hearty, and absolutely delicious. Made with quality ingredients and stacked with flavor, this burger delivers the perfect balance of juicy, crispy, and creamy in every bite.

title: KitKat Blend
description: A delightful fusion of rich coffee, creamy milk and crunchy KitKat pieces, blended with ice.Indulge in the ultimate chocolatey treat with our KitKat Blend — a rich, creamy milkshake or frappe (your choice) infused with crushed KitKat bars. It’s the perfect fusion of silky sweetness and irresistible crunch!

title: Margherita Pizza
description: A loaded pizza with a variety of fresh vegetables, including mushrooms, onions, peppers, olives, and jalapeno.Simple, elegant, and bursting with flavor — the Margherita Pizza is an all-time favorite that proves less is more. With its perfectly balanced ingredients and timeless appeal, every bite delivers freshness, richness, and comfort.

title: Chicken Quantico
description: Tender chicken coated in a light and crispy batter, fried to a golden brown, and tossed in your choice of sauce.Get ready to experience chicken like never before with our signature Chicken Quantico — a dish that combines intense flavor with irresistible texture. Perfectly cooked chicken is marinated in a secret blend of spices, grilled or pan-seared to juicy perfection, then coated in a bold, smoky sauce that packs a punch.

title: Big Bite Burger
description: A classic American burger featuring two juicy patties, fried egg, crisp lettuce, jalapeno and our tangy sauce on a toasted bun.The Big Bite Burger is not just a meal — it’s an experience. Stacked high with juicy, flavorful ingredients and made to satisfy the hungriest of appetites, this burger is all about bold bites and mouthwatering layer

title: Grilled Chicken
description: Succulent grilled chicken seasoned to perfection.Our Grilled Chicken is a wholesome classic, made for those who love bold taste without the guilt. Marinated in a blend of herbs and spices, then flame-grilled to perfection, each piece is tender, juicy, and infused with smoky goodness.

title: Mexican Chicken
description: Spicy Mexican style chicken with authentic flavors.Bring the bold taste of Mexico to your plate with our Mexican Chicken — a sizzling, flavor-packed dish marinated in traditional spices and cooked to juicy perfection. It’s everything you love about Mexican cuisine: colorful, spicy, and bursting with flavor.

title: Chicago Deep Pizza
description: A classic Chicago style deep dish pizza.Get ready for a serious slice of satisfaction with our Chicago Deep Dish Pizza — a true icon of indulgence. Baked in a deep, buttery crust that rises high and holds nothing back, this pizza is all about layers: thick cheese, rich sauce, and hearty toppings stacked sky-high.

title: King Burger
description: A mighty burger fit for a king.Nothing beats the unbeatable combo of a juicy burger and crispy golden fries. Our Burger & Fries meal brings you the perfect balance of comfort, flavor, and satisfaction — made fresh, served hot, and built to hit the spot.

title: Chicken Ala Kiev
description: Classic Chicken Ala Kiev, crispy and juicy.A true classic of European cuisine, Chicken à la Kiev is a refined dish known for its rich flavor and irresistible texture. A tender chicken breast is carefully rolled around a garlic-herb butter filling, then breaded and fried to a perfect golden crisp..

title: Brownie Shake
description: Rich and creamy brownie flavored shake.Indulgence reaches new heights with our Brownie Shake — a thick, creamy blend of fudgy chocolate brownies, velvety ice cream, and rich milk chocolate. It’s part drink, part dessert, and 100% delicious.

title: Chicken Stroganoff
description: Creamy chicken stroganoff with tender chicken pieces.Indulge in the rich, comforting flavors of Chicken Stroganoff — a timeless dish that combines tender chicken with a luscious, creamy mushroom sauce. Inspired by the classic Russian recipe, this version offers a lighter take with all the flavor you crave.

title: Alfredo Pasta
description: Classic Alfredo pasta, rich and savory.Dive into a bowl of pure comfort with our Alfredo Pasta — a classic Italian favorite made with a silky, buttery cream sauce and perfectly cooked pasta. It’s smooth, savory, and satisfying in every forkful.

title: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy fish and chips, a timeless classic.Nothing beats the golden crunch of our Fish and Chips — a beloved favorite that brings comfort, flavor, and nostalgia in every bite. Lightly battered, perfectly fried, and served hot with crispy fries, this dish is a timeless crowd-pleaser.
